creditline: Gift of Professor Felton L. Gibbons
inscribed:

14; inscribed verso on mount, lower right, in brown ink: 15

caption: Pomponio Amalteo (Motta di Livenza 1505–1588 San Vito al Tagliamento), A Group of Putti. Pen and brown ink, over red chalk on two pieces of beige paper, mounted down separately on recto and verso of cream card; verso: red chalk with touches of pen and brown ink on two pieces of beige paper, mounted down separately on recto and verso of cream card; 7.9 x 6.2 cm. Gift of Professor Felton L. Gibbons (x1977-109)
